channel.title: 718 Loading 742 Custom Boss' Custom items & Off-hands! Join Hantrix today!
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/2coj0i9.png[/img][/center] [b][font=arial]Rare & custom Armor/Weapons!(Drygores, Dark Dagger, Sovereign, kaplhite armour, Assasins Gear, Torva, pernix, Deathstroke Armour, DemonFlesh, K'ril God Crusher, Tokhaar Warlord! Custom Boss' Such As Farmer, trio, blink, spartans, Necro, Working Nomad, QBD, KBD, All GodWars Boss', Nex, Tormented Demons & So much more! + Boss' For each donor type! Donator Privleges - Reg Donor ;;yell, ;;Bank, Donor boss, Flask shop, custom title, donor zone, Regular Donor Boss Donor Privleges Extreme Donator, ;;yell, ;;Bank, Custom titles with Colors of choice, ExtremeZone Upraged Stalls, And ExtremeDonorShop & Extreme Boss Donor Privleges Supreme Donor, ;;yell, ;;B (Bank On Spot) Custom titles With shades, Supremezone, Opens SupremeDonor Shop, Supreme Boss! Beta Test Content! Special Weapon* Updates & Bug fixes EVERY DAY! 100% active Staff and Coders! + Dedicated staff team and developers that provide great player support. X40 XP rates, Working Xp counter, Fair Drop Rates. Max cape, Complitionist cape, Trimmed Comp, Vet Cape Active player base, Great community, Dice ranks, gamlbing, Perfect Pvp, Perfect Switching, DiceBag, Friendly Staff & Friendly players All skills, Pouches, Prayers, Pots Working Including Money pouch! 100% working Minigames, Troll Invasion, Barrows, Working GodWars Dungeon, PolyPore Dungeon, Slayer Tasks! Hardcore Eco Server Economy is intact, And There is No G.E! New Mercenary Pouches, And custom Boss Pouches you can summon & Use! And A ton More Come check us out! :D [/font][/b] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/4l4nit.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/256qr2h.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2yzkimd.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/qqwm06.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/rm5tg8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/w1y5xf.png[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/kf19b7.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/2la6a0i.png[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/1zvya37.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/257des1.png[/img]
